descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee471/edwardvlad/b_enhanced-1.jpg[/img]

Updates:
-Now added GOLD AND METAL version.
-v. 0.2=Now with normal maps!

Mod details:
First of all sorry for my english.

This is my second mod, and I\'m still working on it.

I always loved the design of the ebony armor, but i didn\'t like the original colour (I prefer the Oblivion one).
So I edited the textures, recolored the armor, added some (a lot of) decorations and details, chainmail where there was cloth etc. Now I can say that it\'s really, REALLY BADASS.

I finished only male version. I\'ll do female one when I\'ll have more time. And the shield too.

Important: I\'m also looking for someone good in editing meshes for when the CK will come out. So please, if you are good in modelling/editing meshes and if you are interested in collaborate with me, please contact me!!!


Installation:
Copy the Data folder to your \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\" folder.
author: edwardvlad

files.name: Skyrim Real Ebony Enhanced - Now with Normal Maps
files.fileName: Skyrim Real Ebony Enhanced - Now with Normal Maps-5340-0-2.rar
